title: 2 bedroom/1 bathroom with detached, enclosed garage parking
posting_body: ['This quiet, lovely, well-maintained, small complex has a beautiful pool and detached enclosed garages!', 'Most units are large and spacious, newly renovated with double pane windows, ceiling fans, and top quality hardwood-looking vinyl flooring.', 'Kitchen equipped with dishwasher, garbage disposal, great cabinet space.', 'Shared onsite laundry facilities.', 'Landlord pays for water and garbage.', 'Minutes away from Los Altos and popular downtown Mountain View and its fine eateries.', 'Walking distance to shops, CalTrain and easy access to freeways.', 'Very close to big tech companies Google, FaceBook, Microsoft etc. as well as Stanford University and the leisurely Bay Area trails.', 'Excellent schools nearby.', '1bed/1bath: Rent: $2100', 'Security Deposit: $1000', 'Lease: One year', 'Required: No pets, no smoking.', 'Credit score 700+, verifiable employment and income 3x monthly rent, Good rental history and references', '2 bed/1 bath: Rent $2700', 'Security Deposit: $1200', 'Lease: One year', 'Required: No pets, no smoking.', 'Credit score 700+, verifiable employment and income 3x monthly rent, Good rental history and references']
